# Use this 
```{r}
fig2 <- 
  ggarrange(imp_2016_plot,
            imp_2020_plot,
            gris_2016_plot,
            gris_2017_plot,
            bim_2018_plot,
            bim_2017_plot,
            vagans_plot,
            NULL,
            ncol = 2, nrow = 4,
            align = "v")

axis <- annotate_figure(fig2,
                left = textGrob(~italic("Crithidia")~ "count (cells per 0.02 ÂµL) ",
                                rot = 90,
                                vjust = 0.5,
                                gp = gpar(cex = 2)))
```
